name: nyoom (termibear)
description:
This is a project by Side Bros for the Heritage Game Jam 2021.

Play as our unsung hero: Mr Lecturer, as he tries to manage his students in a nyoom™ meeting. Keep your students focused in the lesson, ward off intruders who hack into the call and distractions from thwarting the learning experience!

a) What were you inspired by?

We were inspired by the hard work of all our educators, teachers and lecturers who had to adapt to online classes in the midst of this pandemic.

b) What sort of experience / message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

Please respect the hard work that all your lecturers and teachers put in to make it work as best they can for your benefit!

c) Why did you end up choosing this direction for your game?

The endless level is a symbolism for how a teacher's work is neverending, and the hard level more accurately represents the current teacher-to-student ratio in Singapore's current education standards.
